I take it you are doing this within a custom template?

And is there some official HubSpot documentation you’ve followed to get this far? If so, could you share it?

If you or someone you know can write javascript, you could try looking at the URL when the page is loaded? The preferences page ends with `/page` in the path. And the unsubscribe from all page ends with `/direct`. Then you should be able to do different things based on that.

I haven’t tested this myself yet but it sounds right.

Are there any solutions available for inserting dynamic content from outside sources into my email? For example, if I wanted a workflow to send an email out that included the latest newly published products from my website. Similar in concept to a blog RSS feed, but for more than just articles.

Hoping for a solution that is already available in HubSpot. But if we have to go third party and pay for some sort of integration that’s fine too.
This is exactly how I would write it.
